rows.label: qst701801_msg0001
rows.name: All right, it's a promise!

rows.label: qst701801_msg0002
rows.name: What's wrong?

rows.label: qst701801_msg0003
rows.name: Kasumi-san!

rows.label: qst701801_msg0004
rows.name: Um, can you teach me how to sew?

rows.label: qst701801_msg0005
rows.name:
Of course, but what's this all
of a sudden? If you're having
trouble with something, I can...

rows.label: qst701801_msg0006
rows.name:
It's fine. I want to be
able to do it myself.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0007
rows.name:
I can't keep running away
from it just because I'm bad
at it. Kasumi-san, please.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0008
rows.name: You're unusually serious.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0009
rows.name: I made a promise. To do my part.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0011
rows.name:
I understand. What kind of
thing would you like to make?

rows.label: qst701801_msg0012
rows.name: Wh-What kind of thing?

rows.label: qst701801_msg0013
rows.name:
Since it's your first time,
anything is fine. Your
favorite food, or an animal.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0014
rows.name: Then...

rows.label: qst701801_msg0015
rows.name:
Don't you dare say "Adel-sama." It
would be incredibly difficult.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0016
rows.name: Sh-Shut up! I know that much!

rows.label: qst701801_msg0017
rows.name: I was going to say the emblem of Iira.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0018
rows.name:
The pattern is a bit detailed,
but... shall we give it a try?

rows.label: qst701801_msg0019
rows.name: Are you sure?

rows.label: qst701801_msg0020
rows.name:
A handkerchief would be easy to
sew, even for a first-timer.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0021
rows.name:
As for the materials, I might not
have the right color thread on hand.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0022
rows.name:
If you don't have it, let's go
get it. That would be faster.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0023
rows.name:
Then... three Golden Sand
Cocoons, three Cotton Branches,
and two Bladed Holly...

rows.label: qst701801_msg0024
rows.name: This should be enough.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0025
rows.name:
Golden Sand Cocoons... I've heard
Adel-sama talk about those before.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0026
rows.name:
He said they're the cocoons of a rare
insect that lives in a place called
the Streamsand Corridor, right?

rows.label: qst701801_msg0027
rows.name:
Yes. It's a difficult material to
obtain, but I will try to gather it
and return as soon as possible.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0028
rows.name:
Thank you, Kasumi-san. And,
just in case... Hikari too.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0029
rows.name:
It's fine. I'll have you pay
me back three times over.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0030
rows.name: Th-That's dirty!

rows.label: qst701801_msg0031
rows.name:
That's what you get for being
cheeky. Just you wait and see.
